ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those before them also denied but then how great was My denial!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those before them had also denied. And how was My punishment then!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Those who came before them also gave the lie (to the Messengers): then how awesome was My chastisement!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who lived before them had also rejected Our warning, and how terrible was Our retribution!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed those before them had denied – therefore how did My rejection turn out!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed those before them rejected, then how terrible was My reproach
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly those before them rejected (the truth), then how was My disapproval.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those that were before them also cried lies; then how was My horror!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily those before them denied, then (see) the manner of My wrath (with them)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those who went before them belied [the truth]: then how great was My rejection of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly those before them belied; then what wise hath been My wrath!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly those who were before them had impugned [My apostles]; but then how was My rebuttal!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But indeed men before them rejected (My warning): then how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed those before them belied (the Messengers of Allah), then how terrible was My denial (punishment)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who have gone before you also belied (their Messengers) then how was My disapproval!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those before them also denied the truth; and how was My disapproval?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [67:18] And verily those, communities, who were before them denied, then [see] how was My rebuttal!, [how was] My rebuttal of them in destroying them when they denied: in other words, [how] it was true.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily those before them) before your own folk, Muhammad, (denied, then (see) the manner of My wrath (with them)) see how I turned against them with My chastisement!
